segments.text: Bell Captain . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . This is Mr . Wang in Room 1305 . Please send up a boy to help me with my luggage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , sir . How much luggage do you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , two big suitcases and two small bags .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll send someone up right away .
segments.speaker: S1
